alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Lavaca (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 5:03PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Fayette and northwestern Lavaca Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 503 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Schulenburg, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... La Grange, Schulenburg, Flatonia, Moulton, Muldoon, Komensky, Swiss Alp, Freyburg, Dubina, Moravia, High Hill, Engle, O`Quinn, Breslau, Floy, Witting, Ammannsville, Mount Olive, Wied and Colony. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
